mapper.select:
SELECT su.*, mu.user_name, mu.phone, mu.head_img, s.shop_name, mp.id as modular_id FROM js_shop_user su LEFT JOIN js_manager_user mu ON su.manager_user_id = mu.id LEFT JOIN js_shop s ON s.id = su.shop_id LEFT JOIN js_modular_portal mp on mp.id=s.modular_id where su.is_del = 0
and mu.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and su.legal_person_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and mu.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT su.*, mu.user_name, mu.phone, mu.head_img, s.shop_name, mp.id as modular_id FROM js_shop_user su LEFT JOIN js_manager_user mu ON su.manager_user_id = mu.id LEFT JOIN js_shop s ON s.id = su.shop_id LEFT JOIN js_modular_portal mp on mp.id=s.modular_id where su.id = #{id}
